name: places/ChIJCU_Q_YZYwokRXWp8xEwT8VM
formattedAddress: 312 W 83rd St, New York, NY 10024, USA
adrFormatAddress: 312 W 83rd St, New York, NY 10024, USA

originalText.text:
I love this school! I started taking the beginners course this February and I am halfway through now. I can't believe how much we have covered  in these few months. Mrs. Alice gives a ton of homework so be prepared to cancel all of your plans to make sure you get your work done. She will embarass you if you don't have your homework for class.
DO NOT BRING HER SLOPPY HOMEWORK!!! She will tear you apart if you do. She made me cry when I brought in my homework that was 1. late and 2. not completed correctly. After my tears dried, she showed me the proper technique to complete my work and I was able to make the changes and bring it back to her.
Mrs. Alice is tough but she is really sweet  and funny too. While we work in class, she tells us funny stories and keeps us laughing. I really enjoy coming to see her each week.
Also, fyi this is a very expensive course. It is totally worth it though. Aside from tuition, be prepared to spend money on portfolios (3 for $150 each), notions, a dress form, and fabrics.
So I hope this review was helpful. I will give another review after I complete the course in December!

originalText.text: Maison Sapho is a great school to learn French Couture, I am very lucky to be one of Ms. Sapho student, at Maison Sapho I am learning all the techniques I need to do the couture of dressmaking, nightgowns etc, and I will just add my style.
